overview: Wanna get wet? Need some help with your pump? Call a special Pool Service that takes customer satisfaction very seriously. TitanMen exclusives Matthew Bosch and Liam Knox are just a few of the clients seeing red when they dive into the deep end.  Matthew Bosch calls the Redman Pool Service for help with his pipes, and ginger Jack Vidra gets the job done with some impressive polishing.  Pool man Bennett Anthony gets distracted by sunbather Jason Vario, who tests the redhead’s breathing technique in a private lesson.  Naked napper Liam Knox, who cannot resist the ass crack peeking out of the handyman’s jeans, interrupts Jack Vidra’s house call.  Landscaper Adam Ramzi and blue collar Bennett Anthony are hard at work—taking a much-needed pool break that ends with a big splash.
title: Pool Service
